name: MochiRoll!
description:
The Mochilympics are here! And the main event is about to begin. Two teams of the world’s best Boba Hunters wait at the opposite ends of the maze. Lying in the heart of the labyrinth lays several boba pearls under the watch of the fierce Tofu Bull. Participants will strategize, fight, and steal to escape with the most pearls and be crowned this year’s Mochi Masters!

MochiRoll! is a capture the flag style, two player, virtual board game where Mochis battle over control of Boba Pearls!
